revised_title: The Effect of Clouds and Vapour on Solar Radiation
tldr: This article investigates the relationship between solar radiation and humidity, finding that cloudy weather and visible vapour can increase the effects of solar radiation. The author also observes that solar radiation appears to increase as the sun enters a white cloud, and conducts experiments with screens to determine the extent of this effect. Further research is needed to understand if this increase is due to radiation or reflection.
